title: The Witches (Captioned)
creator_credit: Nicolas Roeg, Mark Shivas, Jim Henson Productions and Lorimar Film Entertainment
brief_description: When nine year old Luke and his grandmother go for a quiet seaside holiday, they stumble upon a witches’ convention, hosted by the Grand High Witch, (Angelica Huston). When Luke becomes a victim of the witches’ scheme to rid Britain of all its children, by transforming them into mice, he devises a plot with his grandmother to finally rid the world of witches. Based on the book by Roald Dahl.
